originalText.text: I bought a few candles for Christmas presents and I can't rave enough about how good the quality of each one is. I kept the Blue Spruce for myself and it smells like a light male cologne and cleanliness. I gave the Sweet Maple Chai to my girlfriend and she loves that it reminds her of baking cookies with her mom. The candles also have a very good reach without being overbearing. I keep my candle in my living room downstairs and could smell it almost in my room. They also last a very long time considering mine is burning 24/7

originalText.text:
I absolutely adore my candles from Central Park Candle Company! My current favorites are Maple Chai and Pumpkin Pie, both of which are perfect for the colder seasons, but I also can't wait to buy more in the future. The scents are absolutely delicious and strong enough to fill a room without being overpowering. The quality of the burn was on par with luxury brand candles -- very even and clean. Super impressive!

Website ordering process was seamless, shipping was super fast and packaging/attention to detail in the presentation was perfect. I also really appreciate that they added a complementary matchbox and scent sample for their Apple Harvest candle, which might need to be my next purchase.

originalText.text: Everything about my candle-buying experience was perfect. From the website, to the quick shipping, to the amazing packaging, and cute note - it was all so easy and super professional. Most of all I love the scent of my candle, and the fact that it is impactful without being overpowering. And the fact that you can use the candle as a glass later is so cute! I would absolutely purchase from Central Park Candle Co again, especially for super cute gifts!

originalText.text: A perfect candle!  Last year, 12/21, I received a Buffalo Bills candle as a gift. As a life long Bills fan I was impressed with the label … then I opened the lid.  My goodness what a wonderful scent!  Every time I light it, just before kick off, the scent throw is just right. It’s not oppressive or overpowering. Truly, it’s what winning smells like!  Now I’m giving them as gifts and bought myself another one. They are that good. #GoBills

originalText.text: Quality and service were excellent. The candle arrived so soon after ordering, and came beautifully packaged, and with the perfect scent. I purchased the Buffalo Bills candle and love the fresh aroma. Highly recommend as a gift for any family member or friend!
